column3: @promag I ran bitcoind through Instruments on a mac, and noticed I think 40k leaks (not 40 kb, 40 thousand occurrences..) on startup. One of the traces for leaked memory was the DB open call.
Shouldn't it always close pdbCopy before deleting it, not just on failure?\n
Line #537 closes for fSuccess being false and #542 for true. Am I missing a case?
